bibl.title: Public Notices Concerning epiteresis of the one zyteras.
Proceedings of the Sixteenth International Congress of Papyrology
bibl.author: El, Mossallamy Abdalla Hassan S.

bibl.note: Two columns, each containing a "Programma" issued by Vegetus alias Sarapion and Herakleides, two successive strategoi of the Themistes, on August 26 of 135 A.D. and in July/August of 136 A.D.
bibl.seg: El Mossallamy Abdalla Hassan S., Public Notices Concerning epiteresis of the one zyteras.
Proceedings of the Sixteenth International Congress of Papyrology (Chico, 1981) pp. 215-229, 1 fig.
